name: Gun Extravaganza
description:
Gun Extravaganza

(Try playing it in full screen while on the web)

PvP Game

Its available to play with one keyboard!

Game created for the GMT Jam 2020

The "Out of Control" part of this game is two things, first there is a probability game where you don't have control of the gun that will appear.

Second each time a player looses, the loser will pick a card (buff or nerf) to discard and the other two cards will be applied randomly, so you don't have true control of what happens.
